ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have placed constellations in heaven and made them beautiful for those who look.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have placed the signs of the Zodiac in the sky, and decked it out for those who can see;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have indeed set constellations in the heavens and have beautified them for the beholders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have made constellations in the sky and decorated them for the onlookers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We created towers in the skies, and beautified it for the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed, We have put the big stars in the heaven and We beautified it for the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We have made strongholds in the heaven and We have made it fair seeming to the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have set in heaven constellations and decked them out fair to the beholders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily in the heaven we have set mansions of the stars, and We have beautified it for beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have placed constellations in heaven and have beautified it for beholders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have set constellations in the heaven and made it fairseeming unto the beholders
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We have appointed houses in the sky and adorned them for the onlookers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is We Who have set out the zodiacal signs in the heavens, and made them fair-seeming to (all) beholders;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed, We have put the big stars in the heaven and We beautified it for the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have set constellations in the heavens and made them pleasing to the beholders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We placed constellations in the sky, and made them beautiful to the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:16] And verily We have placed in the heaven constellations, twelve [of them]: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo (al-sunbula), Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius and Pisces, which are the mansions of the seven orbiting planets: Mars rules Aries and Scorpio, Venus: Taurus and Libra, Mercury: Gemini and Virgo, the Moon: Cancer, the Sun: Leo, Jupiter: Sagittarius and Pisces, and Saturn: Capricorn and Aquarius; and We have adorned it, with [these] planets, for beholders;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily in the heaven We have set mansions of the stars) by means of which people are guided in the darkness of the sea or land; it is also said that this means: castles, (and We have beautified it) the sky by means of the stars (for beholders) who look at it.
